content.prompt: Which of the following examples best supports the Kerner Commissionâ€™s argument that two separate societies were emerging in the United States?

choices.label: The movement of many families to the suburbs
The arrival of new immigrants from around the world
The existence of racial segregation in the military

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
